property.name: Text
property.value: Main Phase: Pay [2] to score 2 points and turn this card over.

property.name: Text
property.value: Main Phase: Pay [2] to exhaust each opposing character and turn this card over. Characters exhausted this way do not ready during their controller's next Ready Phase.

property.name: Text
property.value: Main Phase: Pay [2] to put two 2 [Laughter] Seashell Friend tokens into play and turn this card over.

property.name: Text
property.value: Main Phase: Pay [2] to search your deck for a Troublemaker, put it into play face-up, then shuffle your deck and turn this card over.

property.name: Text
property.value: Main Phase: Pay [2] to reveal the top five cards of your deck, put a card from your discard pile into your hand for each card with even power revealed this way, then shuffle your deck and turn this card over.

property.name: Text
property.value: Main Phase: Pay [2] to move any number of your characters at home and turn this card over.

property.name: Text
property.value: When this or another one of your Pegasus Friends enters play, that Friend gets +1 power until the end of the turn.

property.name: Text
property.value: Your other Pirates have Competitive 2. You may pay [1] less for the activated abilities of Pirate Ship.

property.name: Text
property.value: Chaos: When this card is flipped, you may put it into play. When this card enters play, it gets +2 power until the end of the turn.

property.name: Text
property.value: When this card enters play, if you have another [Loyalty] character, you may move one of your characters.

property.name: Text
property.value: When you move this card, you may frighten a Friend.

property.name: Text
property.value: When you move another character, you may exhaust one of your characters to move this card.

property.name: Text
property.value: When this card enters play, if you have another [Honesty] character, you may exhaust an opposing character.

property.name: Text
property.value: At the end of your turn, you may dismiss a Resource. If you do, put a +1 power counter on this card.

property.name: Text
property.value: This card enters play with a number of +1 power counters on it equal to the number of +1 power counters on another one of your characters.

property.name: Text
property.value: At the end of your turn, you may put a +1 power counter on one of your Friends.

property.name: Text
property.value: When this card enters play, you may exhaust an opposing character. At the start of your turn, you may exhaust an opposing character.

property.name: Text
property.value: This card can't be frightened. Flip an additional card during faceoffs involving this card.

property.name: Text
property.value: If an opponent would move a character to a Problem, you may exhaust this card. If you do, they choose a different Problem and move that character there instead.

property.name: Text
property.value: This card has +1 power for each of your other Earth Pony characters. At the start of your turn, you may pay [1] to put a 1 [Laughter] Earth Pony Friend token into play.

property.name: Text
property.value: When you move a Friend, you may pay [1] less for your next Friend this turn, to a minimum of [1].

property.name: Text
property.value: At the start of your turn, move this card to a random Problem.

property.name: Text
property.value: When this card enters play, if you have another [Laughter] character, you may draw a card.

property.name: Text
property.value: When this card enters play, you may replace a Problem.

property.name: Text
property.value: When this card enters play, you may dismiss an opposing Friend.

property.name: Text
property.value: When this card enters play, you may put a 2 [Laughter] Seashell Friend token into play.

property.name: Text
property.value: As a random card is selected or a choice is made at random, guess which option or card will be randomly selected. If you guessed correctly, you may exhaust this card to score a point.

property.name: Text
property.value: Troublemakers played here enter play face-up.

property.name: Text
property.value: When this card enters play, if you have another [Magic] character, you may move an opposing character.

property.name: Text
property.value: When you move this card, you may move an opposing character.

property.name: Text
property.value: Opposing characters here have -1 power during faceoffs. Main Phase: Exhaust this card to move an opposing character at this card's Problem.

property.name: Text
property.value: When you play an Event, you may exhaust this card and a number of your other Unicorn Friends equal to that Event's cost to copy its effects.

property.name: Text
property.value: When you move a character, you may exhaust this card to gain [1]. If you moved an opposing character, you may exhaust this card to gain [2] instead.

property.name: Text
property.value: When you play an Event, one of your characters or Troublemakers gets +2 power until the end of the turn.

property.name: Text
property.value: Opponents can't move characters during the Score Phase.

property.name: Text
property.value: This card's power is doubled for each Troublemaker here.

property.name: Text
property.value: At the end of each opponent's turn, if that opponent did not move any characters this turn, you may retire this card to banish an opposing Friend.

property.name: Text
property.value: Main Phase: Exhaust this card and remove two +1 power counters from it to put a card from your discard pile into your hand.

property.name: Text
property.value: When you play a Seapony, you need -2 power to confront this card's Problem until the end of the turn. Your Seaponies have Showy 1.

property.name: Text
property.value: When this card enters play, if you have another [Generosity] character, you may give a character +2 power until the end of the turn.

property.name: Text
property.value: Chaos: When this card is flipped, you may put it into play. If another one of your Friends would be dismissed, banished, or moved, you may retire this card instead. Main Phase: Retire this card to dismiss an opposing Resource.

property.name: Text
property.value: At the start of your Score Phase, you may exhaust this card to contribute its power to confronting a Problem. This card does not count against your home limit.

property.name: Text
property.value: When you move this card, you may put a +1 power counter on a Friend with 2 or less power.

property.name: Text
property.value: When this card enters play, if you have another [Kindness] character, you may put an opposing Friend with 2 or less power into its owner's hand.

property.name: Text
property.value: When you move a character, you may put this card from your hand into play.

property.name: Text
property.value: When this card enters play, your characters get +1 power until the end of the turn.

property.name: Text
property.value: When a Problem enters play, you may move one of your characters at home to that Problem.

property.name: Text
property.value: While this card is at home, it has Swift.

property.name: Text
property.value: When this card enters play, you may challenge an opposing Troublemaker with it. Flip an additional card during faceoffs involving this card.

property.name: Text
property.value: Immediate: Pay [1] and exhaust this card to move one of your characters. When another one of your Pirate Friends enters play, you may ready this card.

property.name: Text
property.value: When this card enters play, you may draw a card. When you win a faceoff involving this card, you may draw a card and discard a card.

property.name: Text
property.value: Chaos: When this card is flipped, move a character to a random Problem. Swift When this card enters play, you may move up to 3 characters to random Problems.

property.name: Text
property.value: When you play this card, you may frighten each other Friend here.

property.name: Text
property.value: Immediate: Pay [2] and exhaust this card to move one of your characters and one of an opponent's characters.

property.name: Text
property.value: Opponents pay +[1] to play cards during faceoffs involving this card.

property.name: Text
property.value: When you confront this card's Problem, you may retire this card to score two points.

property.name: Text
property.value: When this card enters play, Troublemakers don't prevent you from confronting Problems until the end of the turn.

property.name: Text
property.value: Immediate: Retire another one of your Friends to move this card. When you win a faceoff involving this card, you may put a 1 [Kindness] Critter Friend token into play.

property.name: Text
property.value: When this card enters play, put two 1 [Laughter] Earth Pony Friend tokens into play, then exhaust an opposing character for each of your characters.

property.name: Text
property.value: Stubborn When you put a +1 power counter on this card, you may exhaust it to draw a card.

property.name: Text
property.value: Flip an additional card during Troublemaker faceoffs.

property.name: Text
property.value: Your Troublemakers have +1 power for each Event in your discard pile.

property.name: Text
property.value: While an opponent has more Friends than you, this card's power is doubled.

property.name: Text
property.value: When an opponent moves or plays a character to this card's Problem, you may exhaust that character.

property.name: Text
property.value: If one or more of your Friends with 2 or less printed power would be sent home from a solved Problem, they aren't sent home instead.

property.name: Text
property.value: Flip an additional card during faceoffs involving this card. Opponents flip 1 fewer cards during faceoffs involving this card.

property.name: Text
property.value: Immediate: Exhaust this card to draw 3 cards, then put 2 cards from your hand on top of your deck.

property.name: Text
property.value: When this card enters play, you may put an opposing Friend on top of its owner's deck.

property.name: Text
property.value: When a non-token Friend leaves play, you may put a 1 [Generosity] Unicorn Friend token with Prepared into play. Main Phase: Exhaust this card and retire a Friend to look at the top card of a Problem deck and put it on the top or bottom of that deck.

property.name: Text
property.value: When an opposing character is moved, you may pay [1] and exhaust this card to send that character to its previous area.

property.name: Text
property.value: When this card enters play, you may put an opposing Friend into its owner's hand.

property.name: Text
property.value: Swift This card can't contribute its power to faceoffs.

property.name: Text
property.value: When an opponent challenges one of your Troublemakers, you may move an opposing character.

property.name: Text
property.value: As an opponent plays an Event, you may pay [2] and exhaust this card to cancel that card.

property.name: Text
property.value: When you put one or more cards on top of your deck, you may exhaust this card to put a 1 [Kindness] Critter Friend token into play.

property.name: Text
property.value: Your characters and Troublemakers here have +1 power.

property.name: Text
property.value: When this card enters play, put two 1 [Kindness] Critter Friend tokens into play, then each of your characters gets +2 power until the end of the turn.

property.name: Text
property.value: When you confront this card's Problem, you may put a Critter Friend with cost 2 or less from your discard pile into play.

property.name: Text
property.value: Main Phase: Discard a Friend to give this card the discarded card's colors until the end of the turn.

property.name: Text
property.value: Immediate: Remove a +1 power counter from this card to choose a color. This card gains that color until the end of the turn.

property.name: Text
property.value: Immediate: Move up to two opposing characters.

property.name: Text
property.value: Main Phase: Each player chooses up to 3 of their Friends and retires the rest.

property.name: Text
property.value: Immediate: Frighten up to two Friends.

property.name: Text
property.value: Main Phase: Give a character +2 power until the end of your turn. When you move a character, you may put this card into your hand from your discard pile.

property.name: Text
property.value: Main Phase: Choose one: Put the top 5 cards of a player's deck into that player's discard pile, banish an opposing Friend, or search your deck for a Troublemaker and put it into play face-up.

property.name: Text
property.value: Main Phase: Choose one: Challenge an opposing Troublemaker with all of your characters in play, dismiss an opposing Friend, or your characters get +2 power until the end of the turn.

property.name: Text
property.value: Chaos: While this card is flipped, your characters involved in the faceoff have +1 power until the end of the faceoff. Main Phase: Challenge an opposing Troublemaker with all your characters at its Problem. Your characters involved in the faceoff have +1 power until the end of the faceoff.

property.name: Text
property.value: Immediate: Put two +1 power counters on one of your Friends, then exhaust an opposing character with less power than that Friend.

property.name: Text
property.value: If one or more of your characters would be sent home from here, you may send those characters to other Problems instead.

property.name: Text
property.value: When you move a character to this Problem, you may pay [1] to put two 1 [Kindness] Critter Friend tokens into play.

property.name: Text
property.value: At the end of your turn, you may put a Delay counter on a Problem. Opponents pay +[1] to move characters to a Problem for each Delay counter on that Problem. When an opponent moves a character to a Problem, remove all Delay counters from that Problem.

property.name: Text
property.value: Play to your home. As an opposing Friend enters play, it loses and can't have abilities until the end of the turn.

property.name: Text
property.value: When this Problem is replaced, put five 1 [Laughter] Earth Pony Friend tokens into play.

property.name: Text
property.value: When you move a character to this Problem, your Troublemakers get +2 power until the start of your next turn.

property.name: Text
property.value: Play to your home. When this card enters play, choose a color. Your Mane Character has that color.

property.name: Text
property.value: Play on a Friend. That Friend loses and can't have abilities, can't move, can't be frightened, and can't contribute its power to confronting Problems or to faceoffs.

property.name: Text
property.value: Play on a Friend. That Friend has Showy 2.

property.name: Text
property.value: Play to your home. Main Phase: Pay [1] and exhaust this card to move one of your characters.

property.name: Text
property.value: You flip an additional card during faceoffs.

property.name: Text
property.value: Play to your home. Opponents flip 1 fewer cards during faceoffs. If an opponent would draw a card during their Main Phase, you may exhaust this card instead. If you do, they skip that draw.

property.name: Text
property.value: Play to your home. Main Phase: Pay [1] and exhaust this card to move one of your Troublemakers. At the end of a faceoff, you may put one of your flipped Troublemakers into your hand.

property.name: Text
property.value: Opponents can't move characters away from here.

property.name: Text
property.value: When this card enters play face-up or is uncovered, an opponent discards a card. If you have a Tempest Shadow card in play, that opponent instead reveals their hand and you choose a card. They discard that card.

property.name: Text
property.value: When this card enters play face-up or is uncovered, put eight +1 power counters on it. When an opponent moves a character, remove a +1 power counter from this card.

property.name: Text
property.value: When this card is uncovered, you may turn a Mane Character to its Start side.

property.name: Text
property.value: When you move a character to this Problem, you may put a 1 [Laughter] Earth Pony Friend token into play here.

property.name: Text
property.value: Opposing characters here with 2 or less printed power can't contribute their power to faceoffs.

property.name: Text
property.value: When you confront this Problem, you may move one of your characters.

property.name: Text
property.value: Opponents can't move characters to this Problem unless they pay [1].

property.name: Text
property.value: Opposing characters here have -1 power during faceoffs.

property.name: Text
property.value: When you move a character to this Problem for the first time each turn, you may move another one of your characters to this Problem.

property.name: Text
property.value: When this card enters play, you may move up to two of your characters.

property.name: Text
property.value: If you would put one or more +1 power counters on one of your Friends, you may put that many plus one on that Friend instead.

property.name: Text
property.value: When you play this card, gain control of each opposing Friend until the end of the Score Phase.

property.name: Text
property.value: Main Phase: Exhaust this card to put a Troublemaker from your hand into play face-up, then put a token copy of it into play face-up.

property.name: Text
property.value: If you would choose one effect while playing a Song card, you may choose each effect instead.

property.name: Text
property.value: The player with the lowest power total wins faceoffs involving this card.

property.name: Text
property.value: While you have more Friends than an opponent, you may pay [2] less to play this card. If one of your Friends here would be frightened or dismissed by an opponent, you may put it into its owner's hand instead.

property.name: Text
property.value: Main Phase: Exhaust this card to frighten a Friend. Opponents can't move characters unless they pay [1].

property.name: Text
property.value: Play to your home. You pay [1] less for Transform costs, to a minimum of [1]. Main Phase: Exhaust this card to search your deck for a card with a Transform cost, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then, shuffle your deck.

property.name: Text
property.value: Play to your home. Your Mane Character has +3 power. Main Phase: Pay [1] and exhaust this card to start a faceoff involving your Mane Character and an opposing Friend. If you win the faceoff, frighten that Friend.

property.name: Text
property.value: Characters can't move to or from this card's Problem unless their controller pays [2].
